description.en: The course is comprised of lectures and seminars in which the fundamental framework, most important methods as well as questions central to the methodology of the study of culture and religion are discussed.  Additionally the students are expected to complete three small home assignments and one larger assignment.
description.et: Aine koosneb loengutest ja seminaridest, milles käsitletakse kultuuri- ja religiooniuurimise metodoloogia ülesehitust, peamisi meetodeid ja keskseid küsimusi. Lisaks teevad üleõpilased kolm väiksemat kodutöö ja ühe suurema kodutöö.

objectives.en: To present an overview of the fundamental framework, most important methods and questions central to the methodology of the study of culture and religion.
objectives.et: Anda ülevaade kultuuri- ja religiooniuurimise metodoloogia ülesehitusest, peamistest meetoditest ja olulisematest küsimustest.

learning_outcomes.en: After the completion of the course the student:
- is basic knowledge about the fundamental methodological framework in the study of culture and religion
learning_outcomes.et: - on kursis religiooni- ja kultuuriuurimise metodoloogia ülesehitusega

learning_outcomes.en: - has acquired elementary skills in the application and the main research methods
learning_outcomes.et: - on omandanud esmased oskused peamiste meetodite rakendamisel

learning_outcomes.en: - comprehends central methodological issues and questions in the study of culture and religion
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab kaasa mõelda kesksete metodoloogiliste küsimustega

learning_outcomes.en: - is capable of arguing in favour of his/her position in a clear and critical manner.
